description: Weeping Purple Beech (Fagus sylvatica 'Purpurea Pendula') is an amazing plant species due to its stunning purple foliage. All year round, its pendulous branches are wearing a deep purple to purple-black robe that brings a majestic feel and texture to any garden. This foliage complements a range of different plants and provides a great backdrop for more colorful plants. This plant is also tough and reliable with minimal maintenance and no serious pest or disease issues. It is a great option for adding dramatic foliage and structure to any landscape.
